description: Politician with exactly 20% approval on 10 proposals (at MINOR threshold)
validation_query: SELECT person_id, first_name, last_name, COUNT(*) AS total_proposals, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN approved = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 2) AS approval_rate FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998901' GROUP BY person_id, first_name, last_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10 AND approval_rate < 20
notes: Tests exact 20% threshold with minimum 10 proposals - should trigger MINOR (40)

description: Politician with 19% approval on 15 proposals (below threshold)
validation_query: SELECT person_id, first_name, last_name, total_decisions AS total_proposals, approval_rate FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998902'
notes: Just below 20% threshold (19%) with sufficient sample should still trigger MINOR

description: Politician with 8% approval on 20 proposals (critical ineffectiveness)
validation_query: SELECT person_id, first_name, last_name, total_decisions, approval_rate, rejection_rate FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998903' AND total_decisions >= 10
notes: Very low approval (8%) indicates complete legislative failure - should trigger MINOR (40)

description: Effective politician with 75% approval on 25 proposals
validation_query: SELECT person_id, approval_rate, total_decisions FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998904'
notes: High effectiveness (75% approval) should NOT trigger - validates normal behavior detection

validation_query: SELECT person_id, party, approval_rate, total_decisions FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998905'
notes: Opposition members naturally have lower approval - structural not behavioral. Potential false positive requiring political context

description: Politician with 21% approval on 9 proposals (insufficient sample)
validation_query: SELECT person_id, total_decisions, approval_rate FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998906' AND total_decisions < 10
notes: Requires minimum 10 proposals for statistical significance. 9 proposals should NOT trigger regardless of approval rate

description: New politician with exactly 10 proposals at 20% (minimum sample boundary)
validation_query: SELECT person_id, total_decisions, approval_rate FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998907' HAVING total_decisions = 10
notes: Tests minimum sample size boundary (exactly 10 proposals) - should trigger if below 20%

description: Politician with 18% approval vs party average 65% (47% deviation)
validation_query: SELECT p.person_id, p.approval_rate, AVG(a.approval_rate) OVER (PARTITION BY p.party) AS party_avg, p.approval_rate - AVG(a.approval_rate) OVER (PARTITION BY p.party) AS deviation FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern p, view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern a WHERE p.person_id = '9999999998908' AND p.party = a.party
notes: Extreme deviation from party peers (18% vs 65% avg) indicates individual failure not systemic issue

description: Politician with low approval across multiple committees (15% in 3 committees)
validation_query: SELECT person_id, COUNT(DISTINCT committee) AS committees, SUM(total_decisions) AS total_proposals, ROUND(AVG(approval_rate), 2) AS overall_approval FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998909' GROUP BY person_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT committee) >= 2
notes: Low approval across multiple committees (not just one) indicates systemic ineffectiveness not committee-specific issue

validation_query: SELECT person_id, decision_year, decision_month, approval_rate FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998910' ORDER BY decision_year DESC, decision_month DESC LIMIT 3
notes: Declining trend in effectiveness (35% → 18%) over time signals worsening performance

description: Committee chair with 18% approval on 12 proposals (leadership role)
validation_query: SELECT person_id, committee, approval_rate, total_decisions FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998911'
notes: Committee chairs may have lower approval due to process management role not policy failure. Requires role context

description: Politician with 15% approval on 20 proposals but 5 high-impact laws passed
validation_query: SELECT person_id, total_decisions, approved_decisions, approval_rate FROM view_riksdagen_politician_decision_pattern WHERE person_id = '9999999998912'
notes: Low approval rate but high-impact successes. Current rule doesn't measure proposal quality/impact - potential false positive
